string-array.name: prefSummaries_autoAdvance
string-array.item: Bonisa inkulumo entsha ngemva kokusula noma kokufaka kungobo yomlando
Bonisa inkulumo endadlana ngemva kokufaka kungobo yomlando noma ususe
Bonisa uhlu lwenkulumo ngemva kokufaka kungobo yomlando noma ususeShow conversation list after you archive or delete

string-array.name: promote_calendar_flight_text
string-array.item: I-Google Khalenda ingeza ngokuzenzakalelayo izindiza nokunye ukubhukha kukhalenda yakho.
I-Google Khalenda ingeza ngokuzenzakalelayo izindiza nokunye ukubhukha kukhalenda yakho.
Imicimbu kusuka ku-Gmail ingase yengezwe ngokuzenzakalelayo ngohlelo lokusebenza le-Google Khalenda.
Thola ukubhukha kwendiza, kwehotela nokwendawo yokudlela okwengezwa ngokuzenzakalelayo.

string-array.name: promote_calendar_hotel_title
string-array.item: Ingabe ufuna ukubhukha ngokuzenzakalelayo ku-Khalenda yakho?

string-array.name: promote_calendar_hotel_text
string-array.item: Ngohlelo lokusebenza le-Google Khalenda imicimbi kusuka ku-Gmail yengezwa ngokuzenzakalelayo kukhalenda yakho.
I-Google Khalenda yengeza ngokuzenzakalelayo ukubhukha amahotela nokunye kusuka ku-imeyili yakho.

string-array.name: promote_calendar_restaurant_title
string-array.item: Thola ukubhukha ngokuzenzakalelayo ku-Google Khalenda yakho.

string-array.name: promote_calendar_restaurant_text
string-array.item: I-Google Khalenda yengeza ngokuzenzakalelayo ukubhukha kwendawo yokudlela nokunye ukubhukha kukhalenda yakho.
Imicimbi kusuka ku-Gmail ingase yengezwe ngokuzenzakalelayo kukhalenda yakho.
Thola ukubhukha kwendiza, kwehotela nokwendawo yokudlela okwengezwa ngokuzenzakalelayo.

string-array.name: promote_calendar_event_title
string-array.item: Thola isaziso esifike ngesikhathi ngaphambi komcimbi.

string-array.name: promote_calendar_event_text
string-array.item: I-Google Khalenda yengeza ngokuzenzakalelayo imicimbi nokubhukha, okufana nalokhu okukule imeyili kukhalenda yakho.
Imicimbi kusuka ku-Gmail ingase yengezwe ngokuzenzakalelayo kukhalenda yakho.
Thola imicimbi nokunye ukubhukha okwengezwa ngokuzenzakalelayo nge-Google Khalenda.

string-array.name: promote_calendar_mixed_text
string-array.item: Thola ukubhukha kwendiza, kwehotela nokwendawo yokudlela okwengezwa ngokuzenzakalelayo ku-Google Khalenda yakho.
Imicimbi kusuka ku-Gmail ingase yengezwe ngokuzenzakalelayo kukhalenda yakho.

string-array.name: prefEntries_messageTextSizeSummary
string-array.item: Bonisa okuqukethwe kwemiyalezo kumbhalo wosayizi ovamile
